text: The Remains of the Day is a 1989 novel by Japanese-born British writer Kazuo Ishiguro The Remains of the Day or Remains of the Day may also refer to: * The Remains of the Day (film), a 1993 film based on the novel * The Remains of the Day (musical), a 2010 musical based on the novel * Remains of the Day (album), a 2010 album by the Finnish alternative rock band End of You * "Remains of the Day" (song), a song from the 2005 stop-motion film Corpse Bride * "Remains of the Day", a January 2007 episode from the 17th season of the television series Law & Order ==See also== *Remains (disambiguation)
title: The Remains of the Day (disambiguation)
